entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
